query:
SELECT EXISTS(
                SELECT 1
                FROM organization_member om
                JOIN organization_role r ON om.role_id = r.id
                JOIN github_identity gi ON gi.account_id = om.account_id
                WHERE om.organization_id = $1
                  AND om.account_id = $2
                  AND r.name = 'admin'
            ) as "is_human_admin!"
